Dating: 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before); 3RD INTERMEDIATE PERIOD; LATE PERIOD (not after)
Name: Bes amulet
Description: Amulet representing the god Bes, deformed in appearance and crowned with a plume of ostrich feathers. At the height of the head is a small hole for suspension. The piece has lost a large part of the glazing characteristic of faience.
